mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKET_COMMENT (MARKET_COMMENT_ID, MARKET_REPLY_ID, MEMBER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT) VALUES (MARKET_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{marketReplyId}, #{memberId}, #{marketCommentContent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MARKET_COMMENT WHERE MARKET_REPLY_ID = #{marketReplyId} ORDER BY MARKET_COMMENT_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE MARKET_COMMENT SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{marketCommentContent} WHERE MARKET_COMMENT_ID = #{marketCommentId}
